name: Landing Platform
description: This is the wide-open roof of the ruined building. Wispy purple plants sprint randomly from the web of cracks in the roof's surface. You can still make out the weathered markings that designate this as a platform for arial vehicles. There is a stairwell access door to the south.

interactiveObject.name: terminal
interactiveObject.description: You see a computer terminal set into the wall by the door.

objectActions.verbiage: The small screen of the terminal is dusty and dark. It looks like the power is off.
The terminal screen flickers on and shows the result of a brief start-up check: 'FAILED. This terminal is out of order. Contact your systems administrator for help.'
The words 'ERROR No. 584: OUT OF ORDER' blink on the screen.
The terminal shuts down, exactly as useful as it was when it was on.

name: Stairwell Top
description: The top of a stairwell. The stairs descend from here. To the north, natural light streams in through an open door marked 'EXIT.'

name: Stairwell
description: The stairwell is lit in dim green light, courtesy of barely glowing strips set into the concrete walls. Downstairs there loos to be a door and a landing. It seems a lot brighter upstairs.

name: Landing
description: A floor landing in the stairwell. Like the rest of the stairwell, it is dim and green. To the north of the landing is a steel door marked '4.' The stairs lead up, but the stairs down are impassably choked with rubble.
